summary: Dolat Algotech Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Board meeting held on August 13, 2025 has inter-alia transacted following business: 1. Considered and Approved the Unaudited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2025 along...
fullContent: Dolat Algotech Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Board meeting held on August 13, 2025 has inter-alia transacted following business: 1. Considered and Approved the Unaudited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2025 along with Limited review reports (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Auditor and same are attached herewith.2. Fixed 44th Annual General meeting of the members of the Company to be held on Tuesday, 30th September, 2025 through Video Conferencing/ Other Audio Visual Means;3. Register of Members and Share Transfer Books will be closed from Wednesday, 24th September, 2025 to Tuesday, 30th September, 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of ensuing Annual general meeting; |SUBJECT: Outcome of Board Meeting
